definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Zec 11:8 month (Aram. [[יַרְחָא]], yarh.o0 new moon, month; Palm. [[ירח]] Vog:No. 1; As. arḫ u COT:Gloss. Muss-Arnolt:JBL xi. 1892, 73, 163; cf. Ph. Eth. sub [[יׇרֵחַ]]; Sab. [[ורחַ]] month, DHM:ZMG 1876, 603; 1883, 369 Hal:JAS vii, 1, 516)—abs. [[יֶ֫רַח]] 1Ki 6:37 + 3 t.; cstr. id. De 21:13, 2Ki 15:13; pl. [[יְרָחִים]] Ex 2:2 + 3 t.; cstr. [[יַרְחֵי]] Job 7:3, Job 29:2; —

month, as measure of time, during, or in which Ex 2:2 (E), Zec 11:8, Job 39:2; [[יַרְחֵי שָָׁוְא]] Job 7:3; [[יַרְחֵי קֶדֶם]] Job 29:2; pleon. [[יֶרַת יָמִים]] a month (of) days = a month of time De 21:13, 2Ki 15:13.

calendar month, with name [[יֶרַח זִו]] 1Ki 6:37 (2nd mo., cf. v:1Ki 6:1); [[יֶרַח בּוּל]] v:1Ki 6:38 (8th mo.); [[יֶרַךְ הָאֵתָנִים]] 1Ki 8:2 (7th mo.); cf. [[בְּמִסְפַּר יְרָחִים]] [[אַל־יׇבאׁ]] Job 3:6; [[גֶּרֶשׁ יְרָתִים]] De 33:4 produce of months, i.e. of various seasons of year.—Cf. synon. [[חׂדֶשׁ]].
